macaddr.description: Sets the lease host MAC address.

statements.description: Attach a list of OMAPI DHCP statements with host lease (without ending semicolon).

name.description: Sets the host lease hostname (mandatory if state=present).

key_name.description: Sets the TSIG key name for authenticating against OMAPI server.

host.description: Sets OMAPI server host to interact with.

ddns.description: Enable dynamic DNS updates for this host.

key.description: Sets the TSIG key content for authenticating against OMAPI server.

ip.description: Sets the lease host IP address.

port.description: Sets the OMAPI server port to interact with.
